QuestData.Title: Ambassador to the Ancient
QuestData.Description: I have seen a tough looking "tree" in that growth. It cries and moans but does not act hostile.$b$bIt may know how to get rid of these plants. Go and see if it does.
QuestData.LogDescription: Talk to Birchus at Dionor's Demise in Gorgrond.
QuestData.RewardText: So that is why the saberon have barricaded themselves up there. They are good hunting $p, and I want to get in there!$b$bI have an idea about that...
